description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Suspension of advance ticket sales for selected train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 個別列車車次暫停預售

2025-09-27T13:26:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, advance ticket sales for the following train trips will be suspended due to train schedule adjustments: For 11 Oct and onwards: To Tianjinxi Station: G306 To Kunmingnan Station: G408/9 To Shanghai Hongqiao Station: G900 To Guangzhoudong Station: G6550 Departing from Meizhouxi Station: G6541 Departing from Guangzhoudong Station: G6561 For the latest advance ticket sales arrangements, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) and mobile app, High Speed Rail website and mobile app.
2025-09-27T13:26:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通知，為配合行車時間表調整，以下列車車次會暫停預售： 10月11日及以後的車次： 前往天津西：G306 前往昆明南：G408/9 前往上海虹橋：G900 前往廣州東：G6550 由梅州西出發：G6541 由廣州東出發：G6561 有關最新預售安排，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)及手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

2025-09-27T15:46:00.CONTENT_EN:
The following road sections are busy:
Hong Kong Island
– Gloucester Road (Wan Chai Interchange bound)
Kowloon
– Prince Edward Road West (Mong Kok bound)
– Waterloo Road (Tsim Sha Tsui bound)
– Chatham Road North (Yau Ma Tei bound)
Motorists passing through the above road section(s) are advised to drive with utmost care and patience.
2025-09-27T15:46:00.CONTENT_CN:
以下路段的交通繁忙:
香港島
–告士打道(往灣仔交匯處方向)
九龍
–太子道西(往旺角方向)
–窩打老道(往尖沙咀方向)
–漆咸道北(往油麻地方向)
駕駛人士行經上述路段敬請忍讓及小心駕駛。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic and transport arrangements for departure of concert at the Kai Tak Stadium of Kai Tak Sports Park
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德體育園啟德主場館演唱會離場特別交通及運輸安排

2025-09-27T21:04:00.CONTENT_EN:
The concert at the Kai Tak Stadium of Kai Tak Sports Park (KTSP) is scheduled to end later tonight (September 27). As a large number of spectators is expected to disperse at the same time, the Transport Department (TD) urges those leaving the venue to take the MTR as far as possible. 

Details of Public Transport Services

MTR:
- The headway of the Tuen Ma Line has been enhanced to disperse spectators;
- Of note, for cross-boundary travellers, the last train to Lo Wu Station on the ERL via interchanging at Tai Wai Station will depart from Sung Wong Toi Station at 10.59pm and Kai Tak Station at 11.01pm;

Special bus routes:
- Eleven special bus routes have been arranged at the Sung Wong Toi Road Pick-up/Drop-off Area departing for ports and major districts across the territory;
- Cross-boundary travellers may take route no. SP12 to Lok Ma Chau (San Tin) Public Transport Interchange and transfer to the Lok Ma Chau-Huanggang cross-boundary shuttle bus (Yellow Bus) to Lok Ma Chau/Huanggang (LMC/HG) Port; or route No. A25S to the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Hong Kong Port and transfer to the HZMB shuttle bus (Gold Bus) to Macao and Zhuhai; and

Taxis:
- Taxi pick-up/drop-off area at the Kai Tak Stadium (G/F outside Gate H) is opened for taxi pick-up. In view of an outflux of spectators, the waiting time is anticipated to be longer and your patience is appreciated. 

Spectators are advised to take heed of the real-time information via on-site broadcast and the "Easy Leave" (easyleave. police. gov. hk) as well as the latest traffic news through the TD's website (www. td. gov. hk), the "HKeMobility" mobile application, radio and television broadcasts.
2025-09-27T21:04:00.CONTENT_CN:
正在啟德體育園啟德主場館舉行的演唱會預計今日（九月二十七日）稍後結束。由於同一時間離場觀眾較多，運輸署呼籲離場人士盡量乘搭港鐵。

公共運輸服務詳情

港鐵：
-屯馬綫已加密班次疏導離場觀眾；
-過境旅客請注意，經大圍站接駁東鐵綫往羅湖站的最後一班列車將於晚上十時五十九分由宋皇臺站，以及十一時○一分由啟德站開出；

特別巴士路線：
-宋皇臺道上落客區已安排11條特別巴士路線前往口岸及港九新界各主要地區；
-過境旅客可乘坐第SP12號線往落馬洲（新田）公共運輸交匯處，轉乘落馬洲—皇崗過境穿梭巴士(皇巴)前往落馬洲/皇崗口岸；或第A25S號線在港珠澳大橋香港口岸轉乘港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士（金巴）前往澳門及珠海；及

的士：
-啟德主場館的士上落客區（H閘外地面）開放供的士上客。由於離場人士較多，預期輪候時間會較長，請耐心輪候登車。

　　觀眾請留意場地廣播和「離場易」（easyleave.police.gov.hk）提供的實時資訊，以及經運輸署網頁（www.td.gov.hk）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式、電台和電視台發放的最新交通消息。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Taxi service for concert at Kai Tak Stadium of the Kai Tak Sports Park
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德體育園啟德主場館演唱會的士服務

2025-09-27T21:40:00.CONTENT_EN: The Transport Department (TD) today (September 27) said that it is the peak dispersal period of concert at Kai Tak Stadium of the Kai Tak Sports Park, the passenger queue for taxi service at the Kai Tak Stadium Taxi Pick-up/Drop-off Area is relatively long and it would take some time for boarding the taxis. Spectators are advised to use the MTR to leave the Kai Tak Sports Park. Spectators are advised to take heed of the real-time information via on-site broadcast and the "Easy Leave" (easyleave. police. gov. hk) as well as the latest traffic news through the TD's website (www. td. gov. hk), the "HKeMobility" mobile application, radio and television broadcasts.
2025-09-27T21:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署今日(九月二十七日）表示現時為啟德體育園啟德主場館演唱會散場人流高峰時段，啟德主場館的士上落客區現時輪候人數較多，輪候時間會較長。觀眾請選擇乘搭港鐵離開啟德體育園。 觀眾請留意場地廣播和「離場易」（easyleave.police.gov.hk）提供的實時資訊，以及經運輸署網頁（www.td.gov.hk）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式、電台和電視台發放的最新交通消息。

2025-09-28T17:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the mechanical defects, the kaito service Ma Liu Shui - Tap Mun via Ko Lau Wan, Chek Keng and Wong Shek Pier has been suspended. The operator is arranging another vessel, and the service resume time will be announced as soon as possible.
2025-09-28T17:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於機件故障馬料水—塔門航線經高流灣、赤徑及黃石碼頭的服務暫停。營辦商現正安排後備船，復航時間將盡快通知。

2025-09-28T18:16:00.CONTENT_EN: From Ma Liu Shui to Tap Mun ferry service has been resume.
2025-09-28T18:16:00.CONTENT_CN: 馬料水至塔門渡輪航線航班已回復正常。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Structural / Mechanical Defects or Closure of Access

2025-09-28T19:57:00.CONTENT_EN: Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited Due to vessel mechanical failure, the ferry service between Sai Wan Ho and Sam Ka Tsuen was suspended from 7:45 pm until further notice.
2025-09-28T19:57:00.CONTENT_CN: 珊瑚海船務有限公司 因船隻機件故障，來往西灣河與三家村的渡輪服務於晚上7:45起暫停行駛，直至另行通知。

2025-09-28T21:14:00.CONTENT_EN: Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited The ferry service between Sam Ka Tsuen and Sai Wan Ho which was suspended earlier due to vessel mechanical failure has resumed service at 8:45 pm.
2025-09-28T21:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 珊瑚海船務有限公司 較早前因船隻機件故障，航線三家村來回西灣河現已於8:45復航。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic and transport arrangements for departure of concert at the Kai Tak Stadium of Kai Tak Sports Park
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德體育園啟德主場館演唱會離場特別交通及運輸安排

2025-09-28T21:05:00.CONTENT_EN: The concert at the Kai Tak Stadium of Kai Tak Sports Park (KTSP) is scheduled to end later tonight (September 28). As a large number of spectators is expected to disperse at the same time, the Transport Department (TD) urges those leaving the venue to take the MTR as far as possible. Details of Public Transport Services MTR: - The headway of the Tuen Ma Line has been enhanced to disperse spectators; - Of note, for cross-boundary travellers, the last train to Lo Wu Station on the ERL via interchanging at Tai Wai Station will depart from Sung Wong Toi Station at 10.59pm and Kai Tak Station at 11.01pm; Special bus routes: - Eleven special bus routes have been arranged at the Sung Wong Toi Road Pick-up/Drop-off Area departing for ports and major districts across the territory; - Cross-boundary travellers may take route no. SP12 to Lok Ma Chau (San Tin) Public Transport Interchange and transfer to the Lok Ma Chau-Huanggang cross-boundary shuttle bus (Yellow Bus) to Lok Ma Chau/Huanggang (LMC/HG) Port; or route No. A25S to the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Hong Kong Port and transfer to the HZMB shuttle bus (Gold Bus) to Macao and Zhuhai; and Taxis: - Taxi pick-up/drop-off area at the Kai Tak Stadium (G/F outside Gate H) is opened for taxi pick-up. In view of an outflux of spectators, the waiting time is anticipated to be longer and your patience is appreciated. Spectators are advised to take heed of the real-time information via on-site broadcast and the "Easy Leave" (easyleave. police. gov. hk) as well as the latest traffic news through the TD's website (www. td. gov. hk), the "HKeMobility" mobile application, radio and television broadcasts.
2025-09-28T21:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 正在啟德體育園啟德主場館舉行的演唱會預計今日（九月二十八日）稍後結束。由於同一時間離場觀眾較多，運輸署呼籲離場人士盡量乘搭港鐵。 公共運輸服務詳情 港鐵： -屯馬綫已加密班次疏導離場觀眾； -過境旅客請注意，經大圍站接駁東鐵綫往羅湖站的最後一班列車將於晚上十時五十九分由宋皇臺站，以及十一時○一分由啟德站開出； 特別巴士路線： -宋皇臺道上落客區已安排11條特別巴士路線前往口岸及港九新界各主要地區； -過境旅客可乘坐第SP12號線往落馬洲（新田）公共運輸交匯處，轉乘落馬洲—皇崗過境穿梭巴士(皇巴)前往落馬洲/皇崗口岸；或第A25S號線在港珠澳大橋香港口岸轉乘港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士（金巴）前往澳門及珠海；及 的士： -啟德主場館的士上落客區（H閘外地面）開放供的士上客。由於離場人士較多，預期輪候時間會較長，請耐心輪候登車。 　　觀眾請留意場地廣播和「離場易」（easyleave.police.gov.hk）提供的實時資訊，以及經運輸署網頁（www.td.gov.hk）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式、電台和電視台發放的最新交通消息。
